insert: This document will demonstrate the RTL feature available in Visual Editor.

There are 12 Right-To-Left Languages:
ar Arabic
arc Aramaic
dv Divehi
fa Persian
ha Hausa
he Hebrew
khw Khowar
ks Kashmiri
ku Kurdish
ps Pashto
ur Urdu
yi Yiddish

The most widespread RTL writing systems in modern times are: Arabic, Hebrew and Persian
